question: There is ____ University in my town.
exp: यूनिभर्सिटि consonant sound वाट सुरु हन्छ र singular छ ।

question: There is an orange in the table. ____ orange is ripe.
exp: टेबलमा भएको orange नै पाकेको छ कुनै अरु orange हैन ।

question: ___ people are selfish.
exp: people भन्नाले कुनै विशेष समूहलाई नजनाई अनिश्चित समूहलाई जनाएको छ। people=plural
